channel.title: Comments on: Too Many Socks
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Dan
item.dc:creator: Dan
item.description: Whaa?!? Next thing you're going to tell me is that you're tossing out your Encyclopedia Brittanica too!
item.content:encoded: Whaa?!? Next thing you’re going to tell me is that you’re tossing out your Encyclopedia Brittanica too!

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: You're absolutely right. I'm netflixing, but haven't been able to bring myself to part with non-rare dvds...yet.
item.content:encoded: You’re absolutely right. I’m netflixing, but haven’t been able to bring myself to part with non-rare dvds…yet.
